tool_description:
Add TV information to your website or app with our easy to use REST API.
The TVMaze API uses JSON and conforms to the HATEOAS / HAL principles.
name: TVMaze
title: TVMaze

api_list.name: /people/{id}
/schedule

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Whether to show primetime shows only

api_list.name: /shows/{id}
/search/shows?q={query}
/search/people?q={query}
